ComicInfo.Title: Stone, Blood, Burn
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 2 of the chilling 6-part "Serial Boxes." In Miami, Maul and Voodoo are blissfully unaware that a killer with a link to the 'Cats' past is making his deranged and bloody way down the East Coast, putting our heroes on a collision course with the darkest story in WILDCATS history!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:21:38. [CVDB76620]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/wildcats-15-serial-boxes-part-2-stone-blood-burn/4000-76620/
